actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A resolution to request the Secretary of the Interior to restore the name "Bureau of Reclamation" to the bureau of the Department of the Interior charged with administering the Federal reclamation program.

summary.text: Requests the Secretary of the Interior to change the name of the bureau charged with administering the Federal reclamation program from the Water and Power Resources Service to the Bureau of Reclamation.

titles.title: A resolution to request the Secretary of the Interior to restore the name "Bureau of Reclamation" to the bureau of the Department of the Interior charged with administering the Federal reclamation program.
